history.title: About Ajax Casino
history.description2: Ajax Casino is a modern gaming venue offering a wide range of entertainment for gambling enthusiasts. Guests can enjoy various slot machines and electronic table games in a comfortable setting. The casino operates 24/7, ensuring convenience at any time. Loyalty programs and regular promotions provide extra chances to win. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service make this destination ideal for leisure and fun.

customHtml.title: Ajax Casino — A World of Thrill and Comfort
customHtml.description:
Ajax Casino is a modern gaming destination designed for those who value excitement and quality leisure. Guests are welcomed by a stylish interior and a friendly atmosphere that makes every visit special. Located next to a renowned racetrack, the venue offers a unique opportunity to combine casino gaming with the thrill of live horse racing.


Inside, a cozy bar and restaurant serve delicious Canadian cuisine and refreshing drinks, making it the perfect spot for a break or a social gathering. For visitors planning an extended stay, nearby hotels provide comfortable rooms and excellent service, ensuring a seamless experience.


The casino hosts regular entertainment events and themed promotions, creating a festive vibe and offering chances to win extra prizes. The gaming floor features modern slot machines and electronic tables, while betting simulators cater to fans of racing and sports. This variety makes Ajax Casino a true hub of entertainment.


Special attention is given to bonus programs and loyalty rewards. New players enjoy welcome offers, while regular guests receive exclusive benefits, including extra credits and personalized promotions. It’s not just about playing — it’s about maximizing fun and winnings.


Ajax Casino combines excitement, comfort, and top-tier service, delivering a unique experience that keeps guests coming back. Whether you seek thrilling games or a relaxing atmosphere, this destination has it all.


Ajax Casino Visitor Rules

Visiting Ajax Casino requires following certain guidelines to ensure comfort and safety for all guests. The casino admits only adults and maintains standards of conduct and appearance. These rules help create an atmosphere of high-quality service and enjoyable entertainment.


Main rules

  • • Minimum age for entry is 19, and a valid ID must be presented.
  • • Dress code requires neat, presentable clothing; sportswear, beachwear, and overly revealing outfits are not allowed.
  • • Bringing outside food or drinks and taking photos or videos in gaming areas is prohibited.
  • • Guests must follow responsible gaming practices and respect staff and fellow visitors.

Ajax Casino Loyalty Program — More Rewards for Players

The Ajax Casino loyalty program is designed to make gaming more rewarding with tangible benefits. Members earn points for every wager, redeemable for credits, gifts, and exclusive offers. Higher tiers unlock greater privileges, from dining discounts to personalized VIP promotions. New players enjoy a generous welcome bonus, while regular guests receive monthly offers and invitations to private events. It’s the perfect way to boost your chances and enhance your experience.


Program benefits

  • • Welcome bonus up to $750 plus 200 free spins
  • • Earn points on every bet (1 point per $10)
  • • Redeem points for credits and gifts
  • • Dining discounts up to 20%
  • • Weekly promos with prizes up to $5,000
  • • Invitations to VIP events with exclusive rewards

Program tiers

  • • Basic — welcome bonus and standard promos
  • • Silver — increased points and 10% discounts
  • • Gold — monthly bonuses up to $250 and 15% discounts
  • • Platinum — personalized offers, VIP access, and bonuses up to $500

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment and Gaming at  Ajax Casino
customHtml_2.description:
Bonuses and Special Offers at Ajax Casino

Ajax Casino provides guests with more than just gaming — it offers a wide range of bonuses, special promotions, and seasonal events. These offers are designed to make your experience more exciting and boost your chances of winning. The casino hosts themed nights, holiday giveaways, and exclusive deals for both new and regular players. Welcome bonuses, weekly promotions, and massive slot jackpots are just part of the fun. Seasonal events like summer festivals or New Year specials create a festive atmosphere and offer extra rewards.


Examples of bonuses and offers

  • • Welcome bonus: up to $750 + 200 free spins for new players.
  • • Weekly promotions: prize draws up to $5,000 and free bets.
  • • Slot jackpots: winnings on machines up to $100,000.
  • • Seasonal events: holiday bonuses up to $1,000 and festive tournaments.
  • • Themed nights: special games with double points and exclusive prizes.
  • • Holiday specials: birthday bonuses and VIP invitations.

Popular Games at Ajax Casino

Ajax Casino offers a wide range of games designed to satisfy both beginners and seasoned players. The main attraction is its extensive collection of slot machines — from classic three-reel slots to modern video slots packed with bonus features and progressive jackpots. Fans of table games can enjoy electronic versions of blackjack, roulette, and baccarat, providing fast-paced and convenient gameplay. The casino is also known for themed slots with vibrant graphics and engaging storylines. High rollers can head to the High Limit area, featuring premium machines for big wins. Additionally, the adjacent Ajax Downs racetrack adds an extra layer of excitement with live horse racing.


Popular games and entertainment

  • • Slots: Book of Dead, Joker Jackpot, Sizzling Hot, Magic Apple, Legacy of Dead, Big Bass Vegas, Cash of Gods.
  • • Progressive jackpots: slot wins up to $100,000.
  • • Electronic tables: blackjack, roulette, baccarat in digital format.
  • • High Limit Area: 45 premium slots for high stakes.
  • • Seasonal entertainment: horse racing bets and simulcast wagering.

Minimum and Maximum Bets at Ajax Casino

Ajax Casino offers flexible betting options for players with different budgets. You can start with low stakes, while high rollers can enjoy premium areas with large limits. This approach makes the casino accessible to beginners and experienced players alike. Bet ranges vary depending on the game type — slots, electronic tables, or the High Limit zone.


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slots $0.01 $100
Electronic Roulette $1 $500
Electronic Blackjack $5 $1,000
High Limit Slots $25 $25,000

Events and Entertainment at Ajax Casino

Ajax Casino is more than just slot machines and electronic tables — it’s a hub of vibrant events and entertainment. The venue hosts themed nights, holiday promotions, and special shows that create a festive atmosphere. Guests can enjoy live music, artist performances, and seasonal celebrations such as New Year parties or summer festivals. Nightlife is a key feature, with a stylish bar offering cocktails and a party zone featuring DJ sets and dance programs.


Regular events include weekly prize draws, themed gaming nights, and exclusive slot tournaments. Holiday seasons bring spectacular shows and VIP evenings for loyal guests. Seasonal highlights like summer races at Ajax Downs racetrack add an extra thrill to the experience. All of this makes the casino not just a gaming venue but a full-scale entertainment destination.


Entertainment and events

  • • Themed nights — gaming evenings with exclusive prizes and double points.
  • • Live music and DJ shows — parties with dancing and cocktails.
  • • Seasonal festivals — summer races, New Year specials, holiday tournaments.
  • • VIP evenings — private events for loyalty program members.
  • • Bar and lounge area — cocktails, snacks, and a relaxing atmosphere.
  • • Special shows — artist performances and themed entertainment programs.

Bars, Restaurants, and Relaxation at Ajax Casino

Ajax Casino offers guests more than gaming — it provides a complete leisure experience with dining and accommodation options. Inside the casino, the Getaway Restaurant serves Canadian cuisine for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, featuring steaks, seafood, salads, and desserts in a cozy setting. For those who enjoy cocktails and light snacks, the bar and lounge area is perfect for relaxing between games or socializing in the evening.


Nearby, comfortable hotels such as Homewood Suites by Hilton Ajax and Hilton Garden Inn Toronto/Ajax offer spacious rooms, pools, and fitness centers. For visitors seeking an all-in-one experience, Pickering Casino Resort combines a casino with a luxury hotel and additional entertainment facilities. These options make Ajax Casino not just a gaming venue but a destination for a full-service getaway.


Places to relax

  • • Getaway Restaurant — Canadian cuisine, open 11:00 a.m.–9:00 p.m., serving breakfast to dinner.
  • • Bar and lounge area — cocktails, snacks, and a cozy atmosphere.
  • • Homewood Suites by Hilton Ajax — hotel with pool, fitness center, and breakfast, 1 km from the casino.
  • • Hilton Garden Inn Toronto/Ajax — modern hotel with dining and convenient location.
  • • Pickering Casino Resort — casino hotel with spacious rooms and extra entertainment.

items.title: How do I get VIP status?
items.answer: VIP is available through the loyalty program for high-volume players.

items.title: What languages are supported?
items.answer: English is primary, but the site supports multiple languages.

items.title: What payment methods are available?
items.answer: Credit cards, e-wallets, and cash at the cashier.
